scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: A much-published fifteenth century Italian recension of Pope Gregory the Great's Morali, or "Treatise on Morals." A fair copy in a single unidentified hand, this codex contains a table of contents but no index or marginal notations.
